video.title: Samurai Flamenco
video.synopsis: Despite having no superpowers, a male model decides to become the superhero Samurai Flamenco and is joined by a policeman to fight super-criminals.

episodes.synopsis: Male model Masayoshi Hazama becomes the masked vigilante Samurai Flamenco and gets more than he bargained for, until a police officer lends a hand.
episodes.title: Debut of Samurai Flamenco!

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi struggles to justify his double life as a model and crime fighter until he catches an umbrella thief and it brings media attention.
episodes.title: My Umrella Is Missing

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi meets his childhood hero, action star Joji Kaname, but tension builds when Joji uses Masayoshi's newfound fame to help his own career.
episodes.title: Flamenco Vs. Fake Flamenco

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi is dragged into doing the bidding of the idol and aspiring superhero Mari Maya, who fights crime as Flamenco Girl.
episodes.title: Idol Devastation

episodes.synopsis: The partnership of Samurai Flamenco and Flamenco Girl garners media attention, but their conflicting views of justice force them apart.
episodes.title: The Meaning of Justice

episodes.synopsis: When a reward is offered for Samurai Flamenco's identity, Masayoshi is in danger of being exposed, until scientist Jun Harazuka comes to the rescue.
episodes.title: Capture Samumenco!

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Samurai Flamenco and the Flamenco Girls, the city is a safer place ... until a real monster suddenly appears.
episodes.title: Change the World

episodes.synopsis: The evil King Torture unleashes his plan to enslave the people of Japan and challenges Samurai Flamenco to try to stop his monster army.
episodes.title: Attack of the Army of Evil!

episodes.synopsis: When Mari goes after King Torture alone, she ends up a hostage -- a fact that King Torture uses to force Samurai Flamenco into battle.
episodes.title: Predetermined Quota

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi engages King Torture in an epic battle after the villain brutally tortures Moe and reveals his master plan to devastate Japan.
episodes.title: Final Battle in the Enemy Base!

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi learns that there is a new powerful alien threat called From Beyond but also that Joji has assembled a superhero team called the Flamengers.
episodes.title: From Beyond

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi tries to adjust to his role as leader of the Flamengers even as a documentary is made about their fight against From Beyond's monsters.
episodes.title: Document! We Are the Flamengers!!

episodes.synopsis: With From Beyond, estimated to have 60,000 monsters, preparing an eminent attack on Japan, Masayoshi must make major decisions about who to tell.
episodes.title: Night Before the Decisive Battle

episodes.synopsis: A state of emergency is announced, and Masayoshi must control the chaos as From Beyond launches its attack on Japan.
episodes.title: The Destruction of Japan

episodes.synopsis: From Beyond is finally defeated, but in a surprise twist, Masayoshi and his Flamengers team now find themselves in the crosshairs of the government.
episodes.title: Imitation Justice

episodes.synopsis: While Mari revisits King Torture's hideout, Masayoshi, who is growing weak from hunger, meets a homeless man who gives him food and inspiration.
episodes.title: Wandering Hero

episodes.synopsis: To stop him from passing an anti-superhero bill, Masayoshi must take on the Prime Minister, who is now armed with a powerful, high-tech suit.
episodes.title: Ultimate Prime Minister

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi must battle a mysterious creature from space called the Flamencolian, who also has new revelations to share.
episodes.title: Flamenco in Space

episodes.synopsis: After six months of peace, Masayoshi learns disturbing news about Hidenori, and while visiting his friend's home, Masayoshi's own is destroyed.
episodes.title: The Quiet Life

episodes.synopsis: Masayoshi gets a call from Haiji Sawada, the boy who blew up Masayoshi's apartment and is intent on doing more harm to the Flamengers.
episodes.title: Boy From the Past

episodes.synopsis: Joji brings Masayoshi to the hospital where an accident victim has mysterious news, while Haiji kidnaps Hidenori to blackmail Masayoshi.
episodes.title: Teaching Love

episodes.synopsis: Haiji launches his plan to turn Samurai Flamenco into a dark hero by having Hidenori kill him -- so Masayoshi goes to extreme measures to stop him.
episodes.title: Samurai Flamenco Naked!!
